description: Miwa Satoshi is the student body president and a third year student. Many girls are interested in him, but he is only interested in Meiko, and tries to get her to like him in place of Na-chan. His crude sense of humor however, do not sit well with Meiko, who believes him to be irresponsible and a playboy. They do go out for a time, but Meiko is unable to overcome her feelings for Na-chan. After Satoshi tries several times to make her forget him, following the Hiroshima arc he sees that he has no chance to win her over and stops his romantic pursuit of Meiko, staying friends with her instead.
name: Miwa Satoshi
